name: Super Run World: Bro Adventure
description:
Super Run Adventure: Jungle Go - Eat your mushrooms to powerup and run the greatest adventure Super Kingdom World!
Super Run Adventure will bring your childhood back to the classic game. Super Run Adventure’s legendary mission is to rescue the princess and your task is helping your bro run through the mysterious and mushroom islands. Fight against super evil monsters, jump and run over the obstacles to rescue the Princess Mushroom back to Mushroom Kingdom World.

Choose the characters: mario, bro, bino, leppy or bob to save your princess.

This classical game is now in 3d:
+ 8 world levels and 145 platforming puzzles
+ 7 Bosses to defeat to progress to ultimate boss on mushroom island
+ Simple controls unlike any platforming game
+ 3d high-resolution graphics
+ Smooth user interface
+ Music and sound effects

Pass difficult levels with amazing power ups
+ Use Nario to have the ability to "Grow-up" and become bigger
+ Use Leppy to throw bombs at enemies
+ Use Bro to genearte a shield to rescue and protect your princess


Join us for one of the most super fun and adventure game through the mushroom jungle with Super Run Adventure.

Remember to break all time records and Save the princess

Download the best classic arcade game Super Adventure game now!!!
